content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #300

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 94

Submitted by Kanwarpreet Sethi on behalf of KP Sethi from Lantana Consulting Group

Chapter: General
Section:
Type: NEG :exclamation:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Comment:
A section that defining "Context" should be included since it seems to be a major part of the hook/cds service. Currently context isnt defined until the HTTP request section.

## :de: Köln May 2018 Working Group Vote

@kpshek moved the following disposition, seconded by @isaacvetter.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will move the hooks.md into 1.0.md page.

:+1: For: 11
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._
